sentences.en: A timeless comic actor—his simplicity and his apparent ease are matchless.
sentences.cn: 作为喜剧界的常青树——他的简单淳朴与自然大方无人能及。

sentences.en: Cleaning the light is simplicity itself; just wipe it with a cloth.
sentences.cn: 把灯弄干净极容易, 用布一擦就行了.

sentences.en: For the sake of simplicity, the tax form is divided into three sections.
sentences.cn: 为简明起见，税单分成三个部分。

sentences.en: He believes everything with childlike simplicity.
sentences.cn: 他像孩子一样单纯,对一切都信以为真.

sentences.en: It was a plain, grey stone house, distinguished mainly by its largely unspoilt simplicity.
sentences.cn: 这是一幢简朴的灰石房子，主要以其天然简约的风格显得与众不同。

sentences.en: James’ solution to this problem was simplicity itself (= very simple ) .
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯对这个问题的解决办法十分简单。

sentences.en: Mona wrote with a beautiful simplicity of style.
The advantage of the idea was its simplicity.
sentences.cn: 这个主意的优点是简单明了.

sentences.en: The carol has a primitive strength and haunting simplicity.
sentences.cn: 这首颂歌有一种原始的力量和令人难忘的纯朴.

sentences.en: the characterization of physics as the study of simplicity
sentences.cn: 把物理学界定为一门探求简单规律的学问

sentences.en: the grandeur and simplicity of Roman architecture
sentences.cn: 古罗马建筑的雄伟和简朴

sentences.en: the relative simplicity of the new PC
sentences.cn: 新型个人电脑的相对简易

sentences.en: The study was furnished with studious simplicity.
sentences.cn: 书房中布置得简朴是有意的.

sentences.en: The style is marked by simplicity, clarity, and candor.
sentences.cn: 这种风格的特点是简洁、清楚、直截了当。

sentences.en: There is a simplicity about the interior which comes close to blandness.
sentences.cn: 室内布置得很简单，几乎有点平淡无奇。

sentences.en: Using a credit card to pay for an order is simplicity itself.
sentences.cn: 用信用卡支付订单再简单不过了。
